tacobell-freeitem.title: Free Taco!
tacobell-freeitem.description: Buy One Crispy or Soft Taco, Get One of equal or lesser value FREE. One redemption per customer.
tacobell-freeitem.fine_print: At participating locations. Not valid with other offers.

popeyes-2pc.title: Free 2pc Meal
popeyes-2pc.description: Buy One 2pc Meal get One Free. One redemption per customer.
popeyes-2pc.fine_print: Valid at participating locations. Not combinable.

mcd-bogo.title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free — Any Sandwich
mcd-bogo.description: Buy one sandwich, get one of equal or lesser value free. Show coupon to cashier. One redemption per customer.
mcd-bogo.fine_print: Not valid with any other offers. Valid only at participating McDonald's.

wendys-free-side.title: Free Side with Any Entrée
wendys-free-side.description: Get a free side with any entrée purchase.
wendys-free-side.fine_print: One redemption per customer. Not redeemable for cash.

chilis-free-app.title: Free Appetizer with Entrée
chilis-free-app.description: Enjoy a free appetizer with the purchase of any entrée.
chilis-free-app.fine_print: Valid at select Chili’s restaurants only.

kfc-bucket-10.title: $10 Off Family Bucket
kfc-bucket-10.description: Get $10 off any Family Bucket. One redemption per customer.

bk-bogo-whopper.title: BOGO Whopper®
bk-bogo-whopper.description: Buy one Whopper®, get one of equal or lesser value free.

pizzahut-large-5.title: $5 Off Any Large Pizza
pizzahut-large-5.description: Take $5 off any large pizza. One redemption per customer.
pizzahut-large-5.fine_print: Must present coupon at time of order.
